first_para: Robert John 'Bob' Blizzard (born 31 May 1950) is a British Labour Party politician, who is Labour's Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Waveney. He served as the Member of Parliament for Waveney from 1997 to 2010.

full.extract: Robert John 'Bob' Blizzard (born 31 May 1950) is a British Labour Party politician, who is Labour's Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Waveney. He served as the Member of Parliament for Waveney from 1997 to 2010.
full.title: Bob Blizzard
